annotations.description: There's not much that needs to be said about this fantastic Manhattan Variation, it's simple, it's delicious and it was one of the drinks I really obsessed o...
annotations.title: There's Something About Mary

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Rye Whiskey
.5oz (15ml) Lillet Blanc
.5oz (15ml) Cherry Heering
2 Dashes Orange Bitters

Stir and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MSQewg1LuOk
title: Just for Mary
